title: E0: Set up monorepo and workspaces
body: Create a pnpm or npm workspace monorepo with apps/web and apps/api plus shared packages.

title: E0: Configure TypeScript, ESLint, and Prettier
body: Add strict TypeScript configs, ESLint, Prettier, and shared tsconfig/base lint rules.

title: E0: Add GitHub Actions CI pipeline
body: Configure GitHub Actions to run lint, typecheck, tests, and build on push and pull request.

title: E7: Implement zod schemas for core DTOs
body: Define zod validation schemas for auth, client, project, task, milestone, meeting, and asset payloads.

title: E7: Implement auth routes and middleware
body: Add /auth/login, /auth/logout, /auth/me plus JWT or cookie-based auth middleware for protected routes.

title: E7: Centralize API error handling
body: Create Express error-handling middleware that maps zod and domain errors into consistent JSON error responses.

title: E1: Implement clients CRUD API
body: Add GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE endpoints for /clients with filtering by name and industry.

title: E1: Implement contacts API and link to clients
body: Add nested contacts endpoints under clients and standalone /contacts/:id update and delete.

title: E1: Build clients list and detail UI
body: Create clients list page with filters and a detail page showing contacts, projects, recent meetings, and assets.

title: E2: Implement projects CRUD API
body: Add GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE endpoints for /projects with filters for clientId, status, type, and tag.

title: E2: Implement project templates API
body: Load JSON project templates and expose a POST /projects/from-template/:templateId endpoint.

title: E2: Build project list and detail UI with tabs
body: Create projects list page and project detail view with tabs for Summary, Tasks, Milestones, Meetings, Assets, and Status.

title: E3: Implement tasks CRUD API
body: Add /tasks endpoints and /projects/:id/tasks view to create, read, update, and delete tasks.

title: E3: Implement task Kanban move endpoint
body: Add PATCH /tasks/:id/move to update task status and ordering for the Kanban board.

title: E3: Build project task list and Kanban UI
body: Add project-level tasks list and Kanban board grouped by status with drag and drop.

title: E3: Implement milestones CRUD API and UI
body: Add CRUD endpoints and UI for project milestones with due dates and status.

title: E3: Integrate milestones into project summary
body: Show current milestone and upcoming milestones in the project Summary tab.

title: E4: Implement meetings CRUD API and UI
body: Add meeting endpoints and a meeting editor with fields for notes, decisions, and risks.

title: E4: Implement selection-to-task flow for meeting notes
body: Allow selecting text in meeting notes to create a linked task via POST /meetings/:id/tasks-from-selection.

title: E5: Implement AI asset library API
body: Add /assets endpoints to manage prompts, workflows, integrations, datasets, and training materials with filters.

title: E5: Implement project asset linking API
body: Add endpoints to link and unlink assets to projects using a join table.

title: E5: Build asset library and project assets UI
body: Create asset library page with filters and a project Assets tab with link and unlink actions.

title: E6: Implement project status snapshot service and API
body: Compute task counts, overdue tasks, current milestone, and upcoming deadlines in a /projects/:id/status endpoint.

title: E6: Build project status UI and dashboard tiles
body: Render status snapshot and summary text in the project Status tab and show key metrics on the dashboard.

title: E8: Add error and empty states plus toasts
body: Implement user-friendly error states, empty list placeholders, and success/error toast notifications.

title: E8: Add unit and integration tests for core modules
body: Write Jest or Vitest unit tests and API integration tests for auth, clients, projects, tasks, and status.

title: E8: Add Playwright end-to-end happy-path test
body: Automate a full happy-path flow from login through client creation, project template use, meeting notes, task creation, asset linking, and status view.
